title: Plug pulled on rural broadband plans
content: Two out of five alternative broadband schemes have been knocked back in favour of BT, the BBC has learned.

title: Virgin Media cost and speed increase
content: Virgin Media is increasing the cost of its broadband service but will offer a faster 152Mbps service from 2014.

title: US file-sharing traffic in decline
content: BitTorrent traffic in the US has dipped, according to a new study, indicating that piracy might be on the decline.

title: Apple and Samsung back in court
content: Apple and Samsung are heading back to court in a row over damages awarded in a patent action.

title: Microwave signals turned into power
content: Researchers capture microwave signals and turn them in to electrical current capable of charging a mobile phone.

title: Smartphone camera reveals PIN
content: Cambridge University researchers warn that your PIN can be revealed by watching your face through your smartphone camera and listening for clicks through the microphone.

title: Warcraft world gets fifth expansion
content: The fifth expansion for World of Warcraft will see players delve into the history of the long-running online game.

title: Vodafone profits in 'tough' trading
content: Vodafone reports a half-year pre-tax profit of Â£1.5bn ($2.4bn) as it says trading in Europe remained "very tough at present".

title: Security risk to 70,000 card holders
content: Up to 70,000 people in Ireland who took advantage of a customer loyalty offer could have been victims of a "sophisticated criminal attack".

title: iPhone maker Pegatron disappoints
content: Taiwan's Pegatron Corporation reports lower-than-expected third quarter profits amid reports of slowing orders for iPhone 5C.
